Title: Forever
Plot: A horse trainer is found dead in the cargo bay of a private 747 carrying 12 well-heeled passengers and a million-dollar show horse. In Death Valley, Sara and Warrick probe the apparent suicide of a 15-year-old boy found under a bedspread.
GuestStars: Lee Garlington, Patrick Fabian, Susan Walters, Jonathan Slavin, Olivia Friedman, Christinna Chauncey, Kara Houston, Nichael Lawson, Doan Ly, Keith Mackechnie, Cheryl McWilliams, Jill Noel, Nigel Gibbs, Lisa Wilho
